description: Small climb at the outset, then rolling terrain up to falls. Falls are best in the late spring. Ample parking at trail head, and this is a jumping off point for several trails.
directions: Trans Canada Hwy west from Calgary to hwy 40. South to Kananaskis Village turn off. Follow road to Nakiska ski area, and parking area about 1km past turn off for Kananaskis Village, on the right hand side.
title: Troll Falls-2
